title: Faramir, Ithilien Ranger (6P121)
text:
Set:	Ents of Fangorn
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gondor
Twilight:	3
Card Type:	Companion • Man
Strength:	7
Vitality:	3
Resistance:	6
Signet:	Gandalf
Game Text:	Ring-bound. Ranger. If Faramir is in your starting fellowship, his twilight cost is -1. Fellowship: Play a ranger to heal a Ring-bound companion.
Lore:	”'Not while Faramir is Captain… his life is charmed, or fate spares him for some other end.'”
Rarity:	P
